name: 乔纳森·阿里斯 Jonathan Aris
intro: Aris先生生于1971，是名演员和纪录片配音员。 父亲Benjamin Patrick Aris也是一名演员，主要作品有两部BBC情景喜剧Hi-de-Hi!和To the Manor Born。Jonathan先生也是毕业于剑桥大学 参演作品： Spooks (2010) Sherlock (2010) Being Human (2010) Doc Martin (2009) Merlin (2008) Confessions of a Diary Secretary (2007) Beau Brummell: This Charming Man (2006) Sir Richard Leavis in The Amazing Mrs Pritchard (2006) The Government Inspector (2005) Death of a salesman (2005) Jonathan Miller in Not Only But Always (2004) Birthday Girl (2002) Croc 2 (1999) (voices) Topsy-Turvy (1999) Metroland (1997) The Jackal (1997) Fame: The Musical (1995) 配音作品： Air Crash Investigation in the UK. Trapped - two episodes only. The episode is entitled 'Osaka Train Wreck' and discusses the Amagasaki rail crash. The other was the Andes Plane Crash. Microkillers
